page.title: 06St.Albans Shopping Precincts
page.content: These have had a lot of criticism. First was{Heritage Close,}built to replace a department store.The cleared site made some people want a garden, leading to the Abbey,but{15 shops}were built.We found{4 unlet,}few shoppers and pessimistic shopkeepers, blaming lack of parking and high overheads for the poor business. {The Maltings}opened in{1984,}has {16 shops}now and{53 coming,}but not the department store most people had hoped for and still want.{Shoppers } wanted fewer fashion shops,they had hardly any customers,and a large supermarket. { Christopher Place}built in{1984}has {30 shops}and{17,}mostly fashion, are {open so far. Health and Beauty}has{400 {customers}a day.Others are not so popular. Shoppers find car park charges high and want a supermarket.
